item.title: Stinging Nettles and brambles overgrowing path, 15th June
item.description:
Impassable in places, my daughter and I had to turn back. Thank you for your help.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bamfurlong Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked Drains causing retained surface water, 15th June
item.description:
Two drains along The Promenade near the entrance to the gardens (near where the coffee van sits) are blocked. After medium to heavy rain this causes the excess water to continue down the road gully towards the pedestrian crossing at the corner of Sef's Steak House. This causes an issue for pedestrians and car drivers having to take evasive action to avoid splashing those pedestrians waiting to cross. In fact numerous drains on both sides of the road up from Prezzo towards the Queen's Hotel/131 are blocked and need to be looked at if possible?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 123, Promenade, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 Street lights not working, 15th June
item.description:
Regent Street, lamppost numbers 13, 14, 15 are not working. Please sort ASAP as this is key location in town centre and leaves people vulnerable to crime in hours of darkness. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Regent Street, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a sunken drain cover in the northbound carriageway - its been previously reported in November 2023 under Web Reference: 5212149 Enquiry Number: 22034128 but it appears to have not been fixed. Please could this be attended to as it presents a danger/risk of damage to car tyres/suspensions or worse still for cyclists etc., 14th June

item.title: Disintegrated surface, 14th June
item.description:
Shared access way to 27, 28 and 29 Muscroft Road. Surface is completely broken into loose stones making it tricky on foot and with flying stones from cars.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Muscroft Road, Noverton, Cheltenham

item.title: Pavement all broken, 14th June
item.description:
The pavement is slab and many are broken due to cars driving on them to park on the grass. The pavement is uneven and there are many trip hazards. The surfaces isn't suitable for wheelchair users currently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princess Elizabeth Way, Benhall, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked Drain, 14th June
item.description:
The drain in the parking bay near the entrance to the Montpellier Gardens and toilet access is blocked. With minor to heavy rain this causes the water to reach higher than the level of the kerb causing it to flow onto and down the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Walk, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose paving slabs, 14th June
item.description:
Immediately on turning left out of the Regents Arcade on the pedestrianised side, I turned my ankle on loose paving slabs. Please find photos of the loose paving slabs, an overview with a black circle around the area in question, and the swelling on my ankle.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Regent Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Openreach installed access cover within last month. Every time traffic goes over it rattles. The noise is like Chinese torture and can be heard inside our property causing stress and mental health issues., 14th June
